name: Husain Feroz Ali
title: CEO & Founder - Lead Trainer
bio: Fellow of the Society of Actuaries (FSA), USA, with over 20 years of experience. Specializes in actuarial science, risk management, and strategic consulting.

name: Mohammad Irfan
title: Data Science & AI Trainer
bio: Expert in machine learning, data analytics, and AI applications for insurance. Combines actuarial expertise with cutting-edge technology skills.

name: Piyush Goel
title: IFRS 17 & Actuarial Trainer
bio: Actuarial Director with extensive experience in IFRS 17 implementation, reserving, and regulatory compliance across multiple markets.
